'dra'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / /me tog ku mu da dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad ma'i rdzing bu sar par 'jam pa'i pad ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal/ /sbyang pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs me yi 'od 'phro nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i

gzi brjid can/ /glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs can stabs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa mig dang

de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing / /chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung mgyogs shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa

yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag /de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab/ /'dun pas smras pa/ jo jo khyod bltam ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir bram ze ltas

mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan ces bdag gis thos so/ /smras pa/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan/ /khyod kyi bu

btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can/ /de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur/ /nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur/ /gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni/ /btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung 'gyur na/ /byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste/ /

chos kyi chu yis skye dgu 'di tshim byed/ /jo jo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te/ 'di ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi 'on kyang phan par 'tshal ba bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa/ ci zhig /smras pa/ lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang dka'

thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/ kyi pags pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / rtswa dang shing shun gyon pa dang / sen mo dang / skra dang / ag tsom ring por 'jog pa dang / lus la gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag

ji ltar lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang dka' thub drag po rtsom mo/ /jo jo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/ nyams dga' zhing mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba 'di

dang / skyed mos tshal dam pa mchog me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang / rdzing me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur pa/ ngang pa dang / rma bya

dang / khu byug dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngang skya sgra skad 'byin pa/ shing a mra dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / tsam pa ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang / ke sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng gis

legs par brgyan pa/ mig ris su bkod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/ dgun dang / dbyar dang / ston dang / dpyid gnas bde ba rnams dang / khang chen po chos dang /

chos bzang dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs ti se lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par

brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang rol mo'i cha byad rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang dang / khar rnga dang / gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / sgra snyan dang / rdza rnga

dang / pa Ta ha dang / glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / tshul du shis pa dang / spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon

pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa/ lang tsho la bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/ 'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la/ slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod

cig /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar/ /dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol/ /slad kyis bgres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang / /dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsam par mdzod/ /

byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa mi dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ myur du 'gro ba/ g.yo ba/ ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ lag pa

bcangs pa stongs pas byis pa brid pa ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu med pa/ snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i

sdug bsngal can/ 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam

ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho dgang dka' ba ltar ngoms mi shes par byed pa/ tshwa chu ltar skom par byed pa/ sbrul gyi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' ba/ g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/ shes rab can rnams kyis

'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang bcas pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas rnam par spangs pa/ rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/ mi mkhas pa

rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa yin no/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs/ /ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs/ /'dun pa dge ba thams cad

'jig byed par/ /'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga' mi skye/ /de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/ ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la/ sdug bsngal bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po

rtsom ste pags pa 'chang / /skra dang sen mo ag tsom ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul zhugs gnas/ /sred dang ni ldam ldum dag dang drus ma 'bras za kha cig spyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas/ /ji ltar bdag

cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod/ /mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin tu 'byor cing rab tu

rgyas la shin tu lo legs pa/ /de bzhin kun dga'i ra ba dag dang skyed mos tshal dang khang mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs/ /bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi bang dang ni gling bu dag dang glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis/ /dga' bar bgyid dang gar dang glu

dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang btsas dang brdegs dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis

yid byung byas ma gyur/ /sngon chad bag med dbang du song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkrigs shing mun gyur chos 'di mi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tshor ba po las 'das/ /dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs

shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsob gsog snying po med la bdag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste/ /nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan nga byin ngas sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun

dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par 'gyur/ /'dun pas smras pa/ pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing / /do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /mkha' la sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i glog 'dra ba/ /mal na rnam par mdzes

pa 'di la mi gzigs sam/ /pi ldir dang ni khar rnga dag dang sgra snyan dang / /rdza rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang / /bya bang rma bya ka la ping ka sgra 'byin pa/ /mi'am ci yi khyim 'dra 'di yang dor lags sam/ /su ma na dang ud pa la dang pAr shi ka /tsam pa ka dang dri

mchog phreng ba me tog brgyus/ /dus kyi a ga ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang / /byug pa dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam/ /shin tu dri bda' dri ldan ro bro gya nom dang / /skyu rum dag dang bshos gtsang shin tu legs sbyar dang / /skyems kyi ro yang kha ra bcas par

rab sbyar ba/ /'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud/ /grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang / /tsha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / /ka shi pa yi na bza' bzang po mang po dang / /de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud/ /lha yul dag na lha rnams

dag ni ci 'dra bar/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rab 'byor pa/ /dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzod de/ /de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med

par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang mi dang lha yi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur pa med/ /rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag gi nang na 'dug

pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i lha yi nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngon chad spyad/ /lha yi gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor pa mchog la spyad kyang ngoms

ma gyur na da ci dman pa 'di la bsten pas nga ngoms 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no/ /gzhan yang 'dun pa nga ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdug pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing / /gti mug ma rig mun pa

dag na rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu gnod cing rnam par gnod pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bsogs

te sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan por gzungs btab sbyar/ /gru der nga nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgal te bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'da' bar che ba khro ba'i dba' rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glong 'khyil dgra

yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las bsgral lo snyam ste nga sems de 'dra'o/ /de phyir srid 'tsho dgrar bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri dang / /nyon mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgal te/ /bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa/ /rga med shi med zhi ba'i

thang la dgod par bya/ /de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon/ /sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson/ /mi g.yo las kyang mi

g.yo gnod pa med/ /ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo/ /'dun pas smras pa/ jo jo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje'i gnam lcags dgra sta mdung thung mda' char dang / /lcags bskol glog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba

dang / /ri rtse kun tu 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bab kyang / /nga ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir yang mi skyed do/ /de'i tshe lha'i bu nam mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yul rnams la

ni yid kyang ma chags shing / /sems can dag pa snying rje snying brtser ldan/ /blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig /mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa/ /mkha' la rdul gnag du ba mjug dag /mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog

thugs mi chags/ /dri med yul gyi bde bas mi gos te/ /chu las pad ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin/ /dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang /

bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so/ /sgra thams cad kyang mi grag par byas so/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig /nam gyi gung la bab par rig /skar ma'i bdag

po rgyal dang ldan par rig /da kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed par rta bsngags ldan legs par brgyan te ma thogs par nga la byin/ byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de

nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkod pas rings pa rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so/ /de na dri za'i bdag po

rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i

shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /rgyal po chen

po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas slong ba'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs

nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar

ma'i 'od zer thogs pa/ lag na mar me thogs pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa/ mda' gzhu dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phang mdung la sogs pa mtshon

cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ go cha dang ya lad sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang

chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog gi rna rgyan dang /

rgyan thogs pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ /dge slong dag de ltar

'dun pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ mig mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /jo jo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa/ tshod mkhyen pa/ ran pa mkhyen pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/

ci'i slad du bka' de skad stsal/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa da ni dus la bab po/ /smras pa/ jo jo gang gi dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sems can rnams kyi don ni tshol ba na/ /byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas/ /'gro ba dgrol

zhes nga yis yun ring nas/ /smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bab/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid de/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sa bla ba dang bar snang de bzhin skyong / /lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas/ /'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang / /gzhan

'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur/ /klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang / /ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang / /mi mchog mngon par byung ba'i dus bab pas/ /de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par gyur/ /gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / /

rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi spyad/ /de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa/ /mi mchog de la mchod phyir mngon par brtson/ /sngon spyad spyod tshe grogs por gyur pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcur lhags pa yang / /rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta

byed cing / /rjes su 'thun pas mchod pa bya snyam byed/ /gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de/ /rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas/ /lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan/ /gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs/ /lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis

kyang / /g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur/ /sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te/ /mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtog par byed/ /skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te/ /mi yi dam pa de yi mdun 'dug nas/ /yid du 'ong

ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te/ /skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab/ /do mod khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub/ /bdag kyang khyod dang thabs cig mchi bar bgyi/ /'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu yang dag bskul pos bskul byas pa/ /stobs

dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs/ /sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol/ /da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab/ /lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang / /yid 'ong me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/ /de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la

'dug /lha yis bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar/ /grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa/ /de dag thams cad yid dal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams/ /rta dang glang po ba lang ne tsho khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs rnams/ /de dag rnams

kyang yid dal myur du nyal te de dag gzugs mi mthong / /shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang / /glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal/ /rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur/ /bud med tshogs

rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yang ma tshor/ /de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras/ /'dun pa rta pho bsngags ldan bzang po legs brgyan legs par nga la byin/ /gal te nga la byams par

sems na bgegs ma byed par myur du byin/ /'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras/ /sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas ci zhig bgyi/ /dus mkhyen cing ni tshod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ /khyod kyi sgo bkum

gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur/ /brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur/ /'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor/ /kyi hud bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam/ /gzi brjid

ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' zhig thos/ /yan lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed/ /rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di ma tshor/ /bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags

ldan gnyid log byas/ /kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig /lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la smras/ /'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyo mi bya/ /lha dang lha min dag gis rnga dung

rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas/ /'on kyang lhas bsnyal ba yi grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur/ /'dun pa bar snang dri ma med la lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos/ /khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lhags ltos/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya

byin dpung bskor sgo na mdzes par 'dug pa dang / /lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos/ /'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta pho de la smras/ /sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog /de yis dbyar

gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas/ /yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par dbul ba byas/ /mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags/ /khyod kyis sngon chad gang bgos smon lam de grub gyur

cig gshegs su gsol/ /gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig /'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig /de ni gang tshe mal nas langs tshe sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos/ /rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil

'khor 'dra ba de la zhon/ /skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog bteg /brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston/ /de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal/ /de tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan

nyon mongs gnod pa med/ /me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstod/ /thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dong / /skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs/ /mdun du 'dug nas snying

rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad ma 'dra ba'i bzhin la smras/ /khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur/ /do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/ /slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyis sgra

dag dang / /grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sad bgyid pa'i/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang / /bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na/ /gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ /lha dang grub tshogs slan

chad mthong mi 'gyur/ /lha yi dri yang slan chad snom mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar/ /khyod kyis do mod pho brang de bzhin spangs/ /khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis/ /gar la lta ba bzhin du bdag la gda'/ /grong khyer kun gyi byin dang

stobs phrogs te/ /'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags/ /gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du/ /lung bstan drang srong tshig ni deng gyur/ /bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na/ /sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor

'dir gdung yang 'chad/ /shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams/ /dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par/ /bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi/ /'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol/ /blo gros ldan pa khyim

la bltas nas ni/ /snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te/ /skye 'chi mthar 'byin ma thob bar du ni/ /nga yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya/ /rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa/ /byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par/ /nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te/ /

'greng 'dug nyal dang 'chag par mi bya'o/ /gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing / /de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe/ /lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin/ /'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin/ /

'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing / /'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/ /sems can rnams la thugs rje bas/ /'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/ /'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/ /'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag /brtul

zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams/ /'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams/ /don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung / /sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung / /yan lag nying lag gcad gyur kyang / /khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'/ /'di ni

rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/ /bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'/ /'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/ /mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad/ /'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/ /thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni/ /sems can

bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur/ /'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las/ /grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te/ /rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan/ /thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon/ /dga' dang btang snyoms bsam

gtan pa/ /tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen/ /'di ni shin tu lha yi lha/ /lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os/ /thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral/ /yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs/ /mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste/ /gnod pa rnams

kyi skyabs kyang lags/ /ring nas na ba'i sman pa lags/ /rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal/ /dbang po lta bur spyan stong mnga'/ /tshangs pa lta bur rang byung gyur/ /lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa/ /brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang / /dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod

chags bral/ /nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste/ /ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags/ /seng ge lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs/ /glang po lta bur rab dul thugs/ /khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso/ /bzod de 'khrug pa rab tu spangs/ /zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal/ /nyi

ma lta bur snang ba mdzad/ /sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa/ /skar ma lta bur mun pa bral/ /pad ma lta bur chags mi mnga'/ /me tog lta bur khrims dri gda'/ /ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo/ /dog sa lta bur gsos su gyur/ /rin chen 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs/ /'di

ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal/ /'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal/ /'di ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom/ /'di ni ded dpon chen po ste/ /lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la/ /yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog /ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur/ /rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa

po/ /mun pa rab rib rnam par grol/ /sa dang lha yul grags pa yi/ /rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags/ /skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba/ /dpag tu med la bstod pas bstod/ /khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des/ /smra ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog /dge slong

dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas shAkya'i yul dang / kau ta'i yul dang / gyad yul las 'das te me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang nam nangs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o/ /slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/

rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar gtang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar log shig /sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log

pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas

des ral gris gtsug phud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/ deng sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus ston byed do/ /der mchod rten yang byas te/ deng sang mchod rten de gtsug phud

blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung yang gos ka shi pa gyon pa ji ltar rung gis gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni legs so snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas

gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig dgos par gyur to snyam mo/ /de na lha'i bu gcig cig lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du

phyin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur smrig rnams kho bo la byin na/ kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/ 'o ni rnams kyang kho bo la

mdzes so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bslang ngo / /de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/ gos ka shi pa rnams kyang blangs so/ /de nas lha'i bu des mos pa bskyed de lag pa gnyi gas gos

de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / /de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas des mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten de ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so/ /gang gi tshe

byang chub sems dpas gtsug phud bcad nas/ gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong dag dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yi rangs te/ mchog tu rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo / /kye

grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo / /de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang /

'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/ bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ gnod pa

med pa/ zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang ga zha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to/ /sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to/ /de nas btsun

mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/ bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du ngud mo 'thon par gyur to/ /de na bud med kha cig ni

shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/ kha cig ni kyi hud bu zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni kyi hud khyim thab ces 'dzer to/ /kha cig ni rje bo zhes 'dzer to/ /kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o/ /kha cig ni lus rdeb cing

ngu'o/ /kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo/ /kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni brang rdung zhing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa dpung par rdeb cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni mgor rdung zhing ngu'o/ /

kha cig ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni skra 'jig cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho de 'don to/ /kha cig ni mo dug mdas phog pa bzhin du glo bur du rgyug cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni gdong gos

kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni chu shing rlung mar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyor zhing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni sa la sgyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to/ /kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o/ /kha cig ni shing rtsa nas phyung ba bzhin du blo bur du sa la sgyel nas ngu'o/ /

sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag /shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gda'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang

du gzhon nu tshol cig /de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI smre sngags 'don te/ sa la 'gre ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho

nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyed deng la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig /mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo / /zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog

gi char 'bab par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di nas byung ngo snyam nas de dag cung zad cig pha zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni

gzhon nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo/ /de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo / /de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ kye

'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis de la ma dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/ de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang / 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ni ma yin te 'dis kyang gzhon nu

la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo/ /gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi pa 'di rnams 'di la byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / /de dag gis yang 'dun pa la dris pa/ 'di

la ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu dong na nus sam/ des smras pa mi nus so/ /gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa yin te/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer

chen por mi 'jug go zhes de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog go/ /de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi

nang du phyin to/ /de nas ring ba zhig lon pa dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gags pas bteg pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma theg go/ /gang gi tshe de dag

gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo

chen mo gau ta mIs rgyan de dag rdzing du bor te/ deng sang du yang rgyan gyi rdzing zhes ming du chags so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung / /de tshe ser skya'i grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sad/ /kun gyi snying la gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam

sems/ /mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra/ /sa 'tsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad/ /mal du ltas na byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas/ /kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces/ /rgyal po'i

khyim du ngud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur/ /rgyal pos sgra de thos nas sa la sgyel gyur te/ /e ma nga yi bu gcig pa zhes ngud mo phyung / /de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas/ /shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbugs kyang phyung / /sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la lhung bar gyur/ /

skra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur/ /sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por mi thogs shes/ /'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs/ /gzugs ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag spras/ /gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi

yid 'ong sdug /dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os/ /bdag ni mal du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud/ /yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar/ /skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyi/ /sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang

thogs par bgyi/ /khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad par bgyi/ /skyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis/ /rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i/ /grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma

lags 'brog dang mtshungs/ /kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can/ /kyi hud lhug lhug pa yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor/ /kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang / /yon tan ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mi blta'o/ /sru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur

cing / /shAkya'i bu mo ma ngu shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin/ /nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi mthar byed ces/ /mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin/ /drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de/ /nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas/ /'dun pa de la rta mchog dang

ni rgyan rnams gtad/ /'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig /yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni/ /gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi/ /chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang

zhi bar 'gyur zhes smros/ /'dun pa ngu bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa/ /'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces/ /mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis/ /bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis/ /byang chub sems

dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig /nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni/ /khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu bsgom gyur te/ /nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur/ /'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su/ /mi mchog dam

pa de yi skyed mos tshal du phyin/ /skyed mos tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas/ /kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras/ /gzhon nu 'di yi rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang / /skyed mos tshal du phyin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /rgyal pos de skad thos nas

shAkyas bskor nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin/ /sa 'tshos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas/ /tshig de la ni yid ma ches te dgar ma gyur/ /gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang / /byon cing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas

ma yin/ /rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas/ /ngud mo btab ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur/ /kyi hud nga'i bu glu dang rol mo sgra dbyangs mkhas/ /rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song / /'dun pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par smros/ /byang chub

sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig /sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas/ /'dun pas smras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson/ /dgung phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas/ /byang chub sems dpa'

'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du/ /'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung / /bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang / /de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos/ /bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul/ /

phan pa mdzad pa gang du dgyes par gshegs zhes bgyis/ /brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg /dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos/ /nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las

gshegs gyur te/ /'od ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal/ /me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung / /lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/ /nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs/ /'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan

rnams khyer nas su/ /de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang / /sa 'tshos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas/ /rab tu brgyal bar gyur te sa yi steng du sgyel/ /bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni/ /chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed/ /mya ngan

rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong / /phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam byed/ /shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas/ /rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus/ /sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas/ /mya ngan gyur cing sna

tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra/ /kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs can kyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan/ /kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa

rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la ping ka'i sgra skad tshangs

dbyangs snyan ldan pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po/ /kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin

lum bi ni der bltam pa legs bltam pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa'i ye shes sdong po che/ /kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim pa'i sgros can pad ma'i spyan mnga' gser mdog 'dra/ /kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan ba zho ba

mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi shangs legs smin legs smin mtshams bar na dri med mdzod spu gnas pa po/ /kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i rked pa e ne'i byin pa rked pa zlum/ /kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes

pa'i sen mo can/ /de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa/ /kyi hud bdag gi glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba/ /kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa/ /

kyi hud bsngags ldan legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid/ /kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sgron cing slong ma phod/ /do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo sgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te/ /phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs

zhes skabs der tshig gcig tsam zhig ci yi phyir ma smras/ /phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yi phyung ba byas/ /gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su gyur pa dpal yon ldan/ /'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug

bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig /'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyis pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os zhes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na/ /de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos/ /kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la

lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin/ /byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur/ /de yis sngon chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs

nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur/ /rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshig ni thos gyur nas/ /de ni nga ro 'thon cing tshig tu smras pa sa

'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson/ /nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa/ /de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung / /de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu

bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas/ /de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po phyung / /lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur/ /bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yi rgyal

po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul/ /bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra byung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam tu grags/ /'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong khyer pa las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur/ /gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis

g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs/ /de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur/ /de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas/ /mkha' las lha rnams bye ba thal

mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin srin po tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis/ /pad ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag bteg /bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang

ku mu da dang par sha lta bu de la bcibs/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis/ /de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod

nas gshegs/ /bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes/ /lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs/ /lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub

sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing / /de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs 'thud byed cing snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/ /bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo ba mi dga' ma skyed cig /'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song

ngan 'gro med par 'gyur/ /lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur/ /yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung zad med/ /bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin

chen stegs bu ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying po mchog bdug sa 'di la ltos/ /bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der/ /lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha yi 'dod pa'i

dga' bas dga' bar gyis/ /legs pa sa 'tsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzod cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod/ /mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur/ /sa 'tsho mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las

bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags/ /de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la bshum mo ma mdzad cig /rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mis mchod pa yi bkod pa gang lags pa/ /bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag

gis dgung bdun bar du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus/ /khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/ /bdag gis bsams na khyod kyang mi yi dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid/ /

mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /

shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de la gos ngur smrig rnams

blangs te/ /'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze'i rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa'

gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad ma'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so/ /de nas bram ze'i drang srong nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang / des

kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du bos so/ /de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du bos te/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to/ /de'i tshe sgyu rtsal

shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu/ grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang

ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig /de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyis te 'di ni ya mtshan che'o/ /dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/ sgyu

rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bus gang la spyad na tshegs chung ngus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta

bu la spyod cig /dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ nga la mos pa yang yod/ nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis/ chos de nyid thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod

pa dang / brtun pa dang dben par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang / dben par gnas nas/ tshegs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to/ /dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur

ga la ba der song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam/ des smras pa/ kye gau ta ma de de bzhin no/ /ngas smras pa/ kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do/ /des smras pa/ kye gau ta

ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/ de bas na bdag cag gnyi gas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to/ /dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma

rnams la yang don 'thun par byed du bcug go/ /dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing

spyad do snyam mo/ /dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas/ yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo ga la ba der song nas/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo

de'i ngos la nga gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so/ /de nas nga nang par sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang / ldog pa

dang / mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon du lta ba dang / bskum pa dang brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / snam sbyar dang / thang ba dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang / 'bru

mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis nga mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te rnam thos kyi bu'am/ 'on

te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig yin nam snyam mo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste/ /sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar/ /ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas/ /byang chub sems dpas nam nangs

shes nas ni/ /mchog tu blta na mdzes par sham thabs bgos/ /lhung bzed thogs te dma' ba'i yid kyis su/ /de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs/ /gser gyi sa le sbram bzhin rab dul la/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa/ /skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud

med kyis mthong na/ /su yang lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan/ /gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i/ /sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes/ /skye bo sel cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /bud med stong dag khang pa'i steng

'dug cing / /de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang / /srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas/ /de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lta/ /skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe/ /nyo dang 'tshong ba dag kyang mi byed cing / /chang dad can yang chang ni mi 'thung la/ /khyim

dang srang na 'dug par mi dga'o/ /rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/ /de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ /grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod/ /lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes zhes zer/ /kha cig brgya byin lha yi rgyal zhes zer/ /gzhan dag

'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer/ /de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang / /gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha yi bu zhes zer/ /kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du/ /sgra gcan stobs ldan thags ris zhes zer/ /kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du/ /ri rgyal skya la

'dug pa 'di yin zer/ /rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur nas/ /yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo / /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mi de la/ /bsod

snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes bsgo/ /ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas/ /kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras/ /gzugs can snying pos nam nangs zhes nas ni/ /mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te/ /ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song / /ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar

bar mthong / /bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song / /ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing / /rtswa bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong / /rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam

byas nas/ /khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras/ /byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa/ /sa yi bdag po yun tshe srungs shig /kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su/ /re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung / /

gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan/ /lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs ldan na/ /nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te/ /bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/ /ma ga d+hA'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag khyod

mthong bas mchog tu dga'/ /bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig /bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul 'dod pa spyod/ /nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig /slan chad sa gnas rtswa steng ma bzhugs shig /khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon/ /

bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/ /byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing gya gyu med/ /dga' 'gyur phan zhing snying brtse'i tshig smras pa/ /rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur/ /kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do/ /'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha'

yas ldan/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror ltung / /mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pas 'phags ma yin/ /kho bos ngar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor/ /'dod pa shing gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung / /ji ltar sprin dang char pa bzhin du 'gro/ /mi brtan 'gyur

la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/ /dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu/ /de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdung / /rnyed du zin kyang chog par 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe dbang med ma rung rab gyur pa/ /de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen bskyed/ /rgyal po lha yi

'dod pa gang yin dang / /mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i/ /'dod pa thams cad mi gcig gis thob kyang / /de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo/ /rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa/ /'phags pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes gang / /shes rab mkhas pas

chog pa de legs chog /'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med/ /rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing / /sngan chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med/ /ji ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin/ /'dod pa bsten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel/ /rgyal po lus

la yang ltos de mi brtan/ /snying po med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin/ /bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag /rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med/ /kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du/ /blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor te/ /mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob

'dod nas/ /kho bo srid pa mi dga' nges par 'byung / /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal pos der smras pa/ /dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon/ /gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs/ /rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze'am rgyal po lags/ /dge slong khur gyi 'du shes

med na gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong / /mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur tam/ /kho bo'i pha yi ming ni zas gtsang yin/ /yon tan 'dod pas kho bo der rab byung / /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal pos 'di skad

smras/ /khyod mthong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags/ /gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma/ /'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa/ /thugs nas bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub brnyes gyur tshe/ /chos rjes bdag la

chos kyi bgo bsha' mdzod/ /rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni/ /bdag gis mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do/ /de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te/ /rgyal pos shin tu gus par bskor byas nas/ /mi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te/ /slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu

zhugs par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+hA yi grong zhugs te/ /ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don byas nas/ /mi dbang nai ran dza na'i chu 'gram song / /gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o// //

dge slong dag yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston to/ /dge slong

dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshogs dang ldan pa tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa/ kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/

rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa/ mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na/ gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni/

'di bdag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma

gyur gyis/ gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya'am/ bdag rangs

byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/ bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya'am snyam mo/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/

rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig /sus chos bstan pa kun shes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de/ 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo/ /byang

chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thob par 'tshal lo/ /smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste skyil mo krung bcas

nas 'dug go/ /'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam

gtan la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa

dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam las gong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ des smras pa/ med do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad

pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po khyod gang du nges par byung ba'i chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud do/ /des smras pa/ de bas na 'dong khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag la rjes su bslab bo zhes byang chub sems dpa' don 'thun pa dang / slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go/ /byang chub

sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gog par 'gyur ba ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/

dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas/ de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o/ /de'i

tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal cing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma nus kyi/ dge sbyong gau ta mas tshegs chung ngus khong du chud cing mngon du

byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing / de las gong du tshol ba las the tshom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro/ /gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang 'ged par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang pos rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/

byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing song song ngo / /yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang / ri ga yA'i bar na tshogs gzhan

dag cig dus ston byed de/ tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / zas la 'gron du bos so/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+hA'i ri ga yA ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin

par gyur to/ /ri ga yA'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/ de der gnas pa'i tshe/ sngon ma thos pa dang / sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to/ /gsum gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas 'dod pa

dag las sems dben par mi gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin la/ de dag bdag

nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so/ /'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod la

shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan dang / shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du dge sbyong dang / bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par mi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod

pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la sred pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la brgyal ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing / lus la

gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o/ /yang

de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la

thang la bzhag ste/ shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gis gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so/ /de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya

bar mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad de bzhin du

sbyar te de dag gi de ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad

par mngon du bya bar nus so/ /'di lta ste dper na skye bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang / 'od tshol bar gyur la/ des shing skam po'i gtsub stan dang / gtsub shing thogs shing thang la bzhag ste gtsubs na/ des me dbyung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so/ /de bzhin

du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'on kyang de mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i dpe

gsum pa'o/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du

sbyar te/ bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yin la bdag nyid kyis gnod par byas shing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par

mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ga yA'i rir ga yA'i rtse mo la gnas te/ rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de na klung nai ran dza na chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bde

ba/ shing dang shing gel pa mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' yid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam shing nyams dga' ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog

dang 'thun pa ste/ rigs kyi bu spong ba don du gnyer ba la ni 'dis chog go/ /bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i

dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang / lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang / lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta

ste/ sngags spyod pa dang lag pa la ldag pa dang / mi slong ba dang / mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba du ma za ba dang / sha dang nya mi za ba dang / dbyar mi 'byung ba dang / chang dang / phub ma dang / chu yongs su spangs pa dang / khyim gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang bdun nas zas len pa dang /

rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / nya lcibs dang / rtswa ku sha dang / lo ma dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / ba'i gcin dang / 'o thug dang / zho dang / mar dang / bu ram dang / ma brtags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang / bya ngang pa dang / phug ron gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te za ba dang / grong

dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang / ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang / dang / khyi dang / phag dang / spre'u dang / glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang / 'greng ba dang / mi smra ba dang / dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang / kham gcig za ba dang / kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang / zas

lan gcig za ba dang / nyin zhag gcig za ba dang / bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang / zla ba la lta ba dang / bya rgod dang / 'ug pa'i gshog pa thogs pa dang / shing leb dang / rtswa mun dza dang / zar ma'i shun pa

dang / rtswa dUr ba dang / gres ma dang / rnga bal gyi la ba dang / ra bal gyi la ba dang / skra'i la ba dang / ko lpags gyon pa dang / gos gsher ba dang / stegs bu'i steng dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang / thal ba dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / shing leb dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa dang /

gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang / mgo thur du bstan pa dang / tsog tsog por 'dug pa dang / thang la nyal ba dang / gos gcig dang / gos gnyis dang / gsum dang bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / bdun dang / gos mang po srel ba dang / gcer

bur 'dug pa dang / 'khru ba dang / mi 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / ag tsom ring por 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgya shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig za ba dang / thal ba dang / snag tsa dang / me tog spyad spyad pa dang

rdul 'thul ba dang / rdul nag po dang / phyag dar dang / rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang / ba spu dang / mi'i thod pa dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / tshal bu'i smad g.yogs dang / rdzab dang / keng rus thogs pa dang / chu dron po dang / 'bras kyi khu ba

la bar btsags pa dang / khrud ma 'thung ba dang / mdag ma dang / tshon rtsi dang / gos ngur smrig dang / khar ba gsum dang / mgo 'dreg pa dang / ril ba dang / mi'i thod pa dang / khri'i zur shing 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do/ /du ba rngub pa dang /

me rngub pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa gcig dang / lag pa gcig bstod pa dang / rkang pa gcig btsugs pa dang / gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub la sogs pa dang / phub ma la sogs pa dang / mdag ma bsregs pa dang /

bum pa bsregs pa dang / rdo bsregs pa dang / me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang / zas mi za ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'bab stegs su song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba tshol lo/ /rab bsngags zhes bya ba dang / gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang / gzhi

tshugs zhes bya ba dang / smon lam dang / bstod pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbab pa dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang / klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chud do/ /bdag dag par sems shing de dag la rten te/ 'di lta ste tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / gu lang dang /

khyab 'jug dang / lha mo dang / gzhon nu dang / ma mo dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / chu lha dang / nor can gyi bu dang / tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto

'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / dang / 'khor dang / tshogs dang / mtshun dang / sha za dang / lha'i drang srong dang / rgyal po'i drang srong dang / tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag 'tshal zhing de dag la snying por 'du shes so/ /sa dang / chu

dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la yang rten/ ri dang / ri sul dang / klung dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / rgya mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa dang / rdzing bu dang / shing dang / shing gel pa dang / 'khri shing dang / rtswa dang / sdong dum dang /

lhas dang / dur khrod dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srang dag la yang rten to/ /khang pa dang / ka ba dang / rdo ba dang / tho ba dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / dgra sta dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /zho dang / mar dang /

yungs kar dang / nas dang / shing bal gyi phreng ba dang / rtswa dUr ba dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa la bkra shis par 'dzin te/ gzhan mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rten to/ /'di na kha cig bdag cag

gi mtho ris dang thar pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub po snyam du sems te/ de ltar log pa'i lam du song bas skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing / bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la/ dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdag gis

ci nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyi las dang bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas

'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo/ /dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam du bsams nas lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub shin tu drag po shin tu spyad par dka' ba/

shin tu bya bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so/ /ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/ de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa

ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do/ /ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na/ de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun

tu 'gog ste/ bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yo ba med/ sems pa med/ 'gyur ba med cing thams cad du rjes su song ba/ thams cad la mi rten pa ste/ bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa'am/ mi slob pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/

spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so/ /mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par mi byed pa byed pa med pa/ rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/ des thams cad khyab par byed pas na/ bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/

de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o/ /dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang /

sems can chad pa dang / rtag par smra ba/ las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang / lus kyi stobs dang /

mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang / sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ byi dor ma byas pa'i sa tha mal pa la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ /'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir to/ /dge slong dag de nas nga dgun gyi tshes brgyad pa'i nub mo

de ltar lus tshar bcad cing gzir bas/ mchan khung nas kyang rngul byung ste zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rngul byung ste zags nas sa la lhung ste zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo / /'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig mgrin

pa nas bzung ste btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na mchan khung nas kyang rngul byung zhing zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rngul byung zhing zags nas sa la lhung ste/ zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo / /dge slong dag de nas

ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang / kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur te/ rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas

sgra drag po chen po byung ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ sbud pa bus pa'i tshe sgra drag po dang / sgra chen po byung ba de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang / rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang / sgra chen po byung ngo / /dge slong dag de

nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang rna ba 'gags par gyur to/ /de dag 'gags pa dang / rlung gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to/ /dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper

na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btab pa de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to/ /der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/

kye ma'o kyi hud gzhon nu don grub 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

smras so/ /mi yi dbang po shAkya'i sras po 'di/ /brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad cing / /'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par/ /mdzad nas dgon 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grang / /kyi hud sems can snying po thugs dam brtan/ /mgon pos sngan chad bdag

cag dga' ldan du/ /dam chos mchod sbyin la ni 'gron du bos/ /sems can dag khyod dam bcas de ga re/ /de nas lha de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste lha mo sgyu 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod do/ /de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs

kyis bskor nas/ nam phyed tsam na klung nai ran dza na'i 'gram ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' lus skams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas mchi mas brnangs shing ngus nas/ de'i tshe tshigs

su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /lum bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshal du nga bu btsas pa'i tshe/ /seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song / /phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes/ /khyod kyis tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong ma rdzogs/ /'jig rten

sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong nag pos bstan pa yi/ /de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtag des ma mthong / /bus ni yid dga' 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la/ /byang chub kyang ni rjes su ma thob tshul du shi bar gyur/ /bu phyir su la bsgrub phyir sdug bsngal su yi

gan du mdud/ /bdag gi bu gcig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ shin tu snying rje bar ni ngu byed cing / /skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnams bor ba/ /shin tu bu yi smre sngags 'don byed la/ /sa steng 'dug cing 'greng ba 'di su

zhig/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa/ /bdag gis zla ba bcu bar du/ /rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs/ /bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te/ /rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smre/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/ bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu

yod par byas/ ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod pa ste/ drang srong nag pos bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o/ /mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o/ /sa ni rnam brgyar 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid/ /

rin chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phyo srid/ /nyi zla skar tshogs sa la ltung 'gyur srid/ /so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'chi/ /de phyir 'di la mya ngan khyod ma byed/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong / /lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rab tu dga' ste ba spu g.yos nas byang chub

sems dpa' la me tog man dA ra bas gtor te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i sil snyan dkrol zhing / rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo / dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa yod kyis/

ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/ /dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med par zos so/ /dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste de'i tshe'i rgya shug kyang
